A DDR Exclusive Release...!


Release Notes:

The hindi Audio is from the 2H20mins version from DUS.
The Tamil version is 2H25m.
Thus 5 mins movie is missing in the hindi version.

The hindi version movie is cut at 12 different locations, thus a perfect sync cannot be made as part of Hindi audio is missing in source.

I had 3 options here.
1. Either CUT the tamil video to fit with the hindi audio
2. or keep the full length movie and replace the missing audio with neighbouring backgroud music from the tamil version.
3. Do nothing and release just the Tamil audio.

And I opted for option 2 so that you have the full video, even with some missing audio its better than cutting the movie.

There is one section where the Hindi audio is OOS. I left it as is as I had to do a fast sync and another 5 or six cuts would not add more to this CAM version. I would have spent more time if it was a retail version.

Video is excellent for a CAM.

No I wont do a 1080p version as the source has lots of blockings which will render very poorly in a 1080p size
